definitions.definition: ( often with yes ) Used as an affirmative to an offer.
examples: D'you mind if I open the window? — Please do.

definitions.definition: An expression of annoyance , impatience , or exasperation .
examples: Oh, please , do we have to hear that again?
So it's safe to let a 10-year-old use a gun? Please .
So now I have to go back there a third time? Please !

main_definition: ( often with yes ) Used as an affirmative to an offer.
secondary_definitions: An expression of annoyance , impatience , or exasperation .

definitions.definition: Said as a request to repeat information.
examples: Customer while ordering: Can I get a [unintelligible]? Restaurant employee: Please ?

main_definition: ( Cincinnati ) Said as a request to repeat information.
